start_city_edge.desc: You awaken near a derelict district of UrukCorp sprawl. Drones swarm nearby. Your implant buzzes—someone wants you dead.

slum_encounter_enkidu.desc: You meet Enkidu, a synthetic runaway with corrupted memory. He claims he knew you before you were rebuilt.

corp_response_chase.desc: Fighting draws attention. A CorpSec pursuit triggers a lockdown. You must escape.

abandoned_subnet_hideout.desc: In the depths of the net, Enkidu shows you fragments of the Dilmun Protocol. You recall flashes of your past.

siduri_offer_contact.desc: Siduri offers you information in exchange for memory fragments or loyalty. She knows about Dilmun.

core_memory_node_access.desc: You unlock a buried memory node—an image of a younger Enkidu, calling you 'King'. Your past is rewriting itself.

enkidu_trust_build.desc: Enkidu opens up about his fears. He believes you’re becoming someone else. You bond—or don’t.

siduri_trust_build.desc: Siduri tests your willingness to cut ethical corners. She offers you an augment.

enkidu_warns_you.desc: Enkidu warns Siduri will twist your mind. Trust between them fractures. You feel the tension.

first_augmentation_offer.desc: An AI surgeon offers you augmentations—tools for survival, but at a cost to your humanity.

first_augmentation_implant.desc: Pain pulses through you. Your thoughts race, but a piece of yourself feels missing.

corp_ambush_encounter.desc: CorpSec ambushes you mid-journey. Enkidu defends you, gets wounded. Siduri watches, calculating.

data_shard_heist_plan.desc: You plan to steal the Seed of Origin—a digital DNA file linked to resurrection protocols. You need both allies.

data_shard_heist.desc: You penetrate a GodCorp archive. Enkidu saves you from lethal ICE. Siduri extracts the data shard.

act_one_end_siduri_path.desc: Siduri takes the shard, promising power. Enkidu watches, silent. She says it’s time to leave the city.

act_one_end_enkidu_path.desc: Enkidu holds the shard. “This could save us,” he says. Siduri vanishes. He asks you to trust him one more time.
